Package com.tarjanyicsanad.domain.repository

Interface BookRepository

All Known Implementing Classes:
DatabaseBookRepository, InMemoryBookRepository, JpaBookRepository
public interface BookRepository
A repository for Books.

  • Method Details

    • addBook

      void addBook(Book book)
      Add a book to the repository
      Parameters:
      book - the book to add

    • removeBook

      void removeBook(int id) throws BookNotFoundException
      Remove a book from the repository
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to remove
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - if the book with the given id is not found

    • getBook

      Optional<Book> getBook(int id)
      Returns a book with the given id.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the book to return
      Returns:
      an empty optional if no book with the given id is found

    • findBookByTitle

      Book findBookByTitle(String title) throws BookNotFoundException
      Returns a book with the given title.
      Parameters:
      title - the title of the book to return
      Returns:
      an empty optional if no book with the given title is found
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException

    • findAllBooks

      List<Book> findAllBooks()
      Get all books from the repository
      Returns:
      a list of all books in the repository

    • addLoanToBook

      void addLoanToBook(int bookId, String memberEmail, LocalDate returnDate) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Adds a loan to the book with the given id.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the id of the book to add the loan to
      memberEmail - the email of the member who borrowed the book
      returnDate - the date the book should be returned
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid or the book is already borrowed

    • updateBook

      void updateBook(Book book) throws BookNotFoundException
      Updates the book with the same id as the given book.
      Parameters:
      book - the book to update
      Throws:
      BookNotFoundException - if no book with the same id is found
